alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 4:47AM EST until February 04 at 2:34PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Little Sandy River At Grayson affecting Carter and Greenup Counties. For the Little Sandy River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sandy River At Grayson. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Mostly farmland, a few outbuildings, and low spots on roads along river in the vicinity of Grayson start to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.5 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning or early this afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.5 feet on 06/16/1961. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued by Noon EST.
